2. **[JSON Configuration Guide](JSON_GUIDE.md)** (General-Purpose Format)
   - For business/engineering problems (manufacturing, DevOps, finance)

   - General-purpose MDP JSON format

   - Design decisions
   - Algorithm complexity
   - Validation strategy
